title: Tropical avocado and crab salad
ingredients: ['2 Little Gem lettuces, shredded', '1 ripe papaya', '1 large avocado, firm but ripe', '400g can borlotti beans, drained and rinsed', '200g fresh white crab meat', 'DRESSING', '4 tbsp natural low-fat yoghurt', '2 tbsp reduced-fat mayonnaise', 'grated zest and juice of 1 lime', '15g fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped']
